title: Slicer Cursor Idle
description: Slicer Cursor is a unique idle game where the cursor takes center stage. The game revolves around slicing enemies using your cursor, with the aim of leveling up upgrades to increase its slicing power. As an idle game, "Slicer Cursor" offers players a satisfying blend of slicing action and strategic upgrades, making it an entertaining and casual experience for players who enjoy incremental gameplay!
